name: 3D Shark Spear-fishing Hungry Sniper world Games
name_original: 3D Shark Spear-fishing Hungry Sniper world Games
description:
*****Having been stranded on a deep ocean! Be aware

A Dangerous sharks and other sea species are in the waters with all its terror searching for their food that's you. Safe yourself ! . Lets hunt and shoot them using the sniper gun....

Sharks are back in underwater world. Prepare for the ultimate Shark Spear Fishing. These Hungry predators are blood thirsty hunt them all down and clear the ocean with these sea predators! Experience World’s greatest hunting experience.

This Shooting Adventure takes you to the dangerous ocean which is full of thirsty Sharks. You’ll be attacked by Hungry Shark with their sharp teeth. They will try to approach you. Kill as many sharks and other species as you can! Hunt them all down before they attack on you.

Download now our new exciting challenging game "3D Shark Spear-fishing Hungry Sniper world Games" to take the perfect Shot.

Hunt or be hunted!

3D Shark Spear-fishing features include:
+ Realistic 3D fishing world with many sea predators including Sharks
+ Real-life Shark hunting experience
+ Different Shark levels to unlock
+ Intuitive touch or tilt controls
+ Combo bonuses and Gold gems to beat your high score
+ Console quality HD graphics
+ Intuitive interface and controls
+ GAME CENTER Achievements and Leaderboard
+ Facebook social features
Download and Play! Become a Shark hunter.

This game contains advertising, if you make any purchase it is disabled. You'll buy new Guns and Gems through In-App Purchases which can be spent on upgrades the new accessories. Some items and Gems can also be collected during the gameplay...

3D Shark Spear-fishing is updated with new levels, graphics and feature. More updates are coming soon...We always try to give our best and exciting mobile games for users on AppStore...

For more news and details:

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/CreativeDistrix

***Thanks for Playing! Have FUN***
